entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who led the way inside the inn.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's companions, who hesitated outside the door and encouraged Harry to enter.

entities.name: the hog’s head inn
entities.description: A small inn at the top of a side street, with a distinctive sign featuring a wild boar’s severed head.

relationships.description: Harry led the way inside the Hog's Head Inn.
Hermione hesitated outside the door of the Hog's Head Inn.
